channel.title: [PI] Pk server
channel.description:
[b]Hello guys! Today at 10.09.2012 i started making 100% pk server. Credits to Maikie61 from Rune - s erver for Luckscape source![/b]
[size=14pt]- Making whole world to PvP except banks. - PvP system. Correct icons + changing, safe timer. [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/70dreq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2nsz6nl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2urbcqb.png[/img] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=524768.0 thanks for tutorial! :) - Better Combat/Mage/Range. - Editing objects a bit. - PK point system.[/size] [size=14pt]- - - -[/size]
[b]Pictures later when i add something!
If you have any good ideas just comment all ideas! :)
Peace![/b]

item.title: [PI] Pk server
item.dc:creator: @liivapuu13 liivapuu13
item.description:
@liivapuu13 wrote:

Hello guys! Today at 10.09.2012 i started making 100% pk server. Credits to Maikie61 from Rune - s erver for Luckscape source!

[size=14pt]- Making whole world to PvP except banks.

  • PvP system. Correct icons + changing, safe timer.
    70dreq.png781×562

    2nsz6nl.png781×562

    2urbcqb.png781×562

    http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=524768.0 thanks for tutorial!
  • Better Combat/Mage/Range.
  • Editing objects a bit.
  • PK point system.[/size]

[b]Pictures later when i add something!

If you have any good ideas just comment all ideas!
